Hi there,

I want to present to you our [Web hosting](https://www.hetnix.com/web-hosting "Web hosting") offer.
Yeah, it's offer, not offers, as we only have a single plan for this kind of hosting - the "[Unmetered Everything](https://www.hetnix.com/web-hosting "Unmetered Everything")" plan for 4.99€/mo (5.90USD at the moment).
Currently we also offer a .COM or .RO domain for 6mo upfront payment. Contact us for this.

Link: https://www.hetnix.com/web-hosting
![](https://i.imgur.com/2ad2Y9P.jpg "")


As you can find on the product page itself, it allows you to use as many HDD space, Traffic, Mailboxes, SQL Databases... etc., you want, as long as they're actually needed by your platform to be operational.

The only limit imposed is that any of your websites hosted on this kind of account, can not exceed 25.000 hits per month.

Small FAQ (for others, please DM me)
- Is DMCA proof? 
Well DMCA is not an authority in Europe/Romania, so tehnically yes.
However, please do not mix it with copyrighted content, for which we have international laws. :)
- Can I host adult?
Sure, as long as you don't break any law.
- Can I have dedicated IP?
Yes. However this is +1.00€/mo and limited to 1 IP per account.
- IP for ping/latency?
Feel free to ping our website directly, or lg.as3280.net
- PHP Selector?
Yes.
- Letsencrypt SSL?
Yes.
- Control Panel?
DirectAdmin.

Should you have any questions about our services, you can always contact us on the website, or get in touch with me directly to andrei at layerbridge.com.

Thank you for your time!
